name: Space Goons
description:
Space Goons: A strategic arcade style top-down space shooter.

  • Launch in full screen to get full view. 
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move. Space bar to fire. CTRL to activate shields. 
  • Watch your energy bar. Shields will drain energy faster, and bullets will cost some energy per shot. 
  • 200 levels of varying difficulty. 
  • Killing all enemies without missing or dying will gain you a higher score per kill along with an extra life.
